data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Zaifu, Olmi, Massimo, He, Junhua (2011): Revision of the Oriental species of the genus Neodryinus Perkins 1905 (Hymenoptera: Dryinidae: Gonatopodinae), with description of a new species from China. Zootaxa 2790: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205419
